(6255x243+227)/64 mod 512 = 201. (6255x729+745)/128 mod 256 = 46. (6255x729+745)/256 mod 128 = 23. (6255x2187+2491)/512 mod 64 = 35. (6255x6561+7985)/1024 mod 32 = 21.
